name: BlackJack (itch) (Methanier)
description:
A simple blackjack game I made in Unity for a class project.
The art were free assets supplied by the following

Unity Asset Store -

Common Casino Bundle – made by GreenThumbzNerd

Free Playing Cards – Ultimate Sport Pack – made by 1Poly

TurboSquid.com

3D Custom Poker Chips – made by winzmuc
